extendedInfo.description: Here is an app to help you learn to speak Cantonese. Cycle through different words and phrases and see if you know how to say them. If you don't know how to say them then click on the audio button and hear how the word is pronounced.See if you can beat your score as you memorize more and more words.If you like this and find it helpful remember to leave some feedback. Also if there are any words or phrases that you would like to see included in this app please let us know and we will try to include them in future releases.

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Can\'t hear audio and doesn\'t give u a chance to answer
reviews.author: Shane Read

reviews.title: Simply enjoyable and effective
reviews.comment: The UI is not fancy but it has all you need for intended purpose.  It\'s easy to follow and fun to play along.   I\'ve been wanting to learn some basic Cantonese for ages but never actually managed to. With this app I found myself learning a lot playing along.  Simple yet effective.  I\'d recommend for those who want to learn some basics of Cantonese.
reviews.author: Deon Guo
